data.text: @hcldr I'd be happy if it puts an end to shaking hands and close-talkers. #hcldr

@DrSinhaEsq @hcldr 🐑🐑🐑🐑🐑🐑 
Working class ages 18-64 chances of dying IF you get Covid .0054%

1. data also includes people that died “with” Covid compared to “of” Covid

2.  %’s are off of having a case of Covid. If you want to do the whole population of that age group that % is even lower

@hcldr One of the practices/take-aways out of Covid19 home antibody test kits was "staging" you're recovery. The pass/fail results help ID when you're mostly recovered, or still infectious & need to confine. Wish it included a supporting symptom/overall health graph.
@hcldr I will absolutely continue to mask in subways and on airplanes. And anywhere else I choose to wear one, for that matter! #hcldr
@Cascadia @hcldr T4 Oh I really like that Sherry! #hcldr
@hcldr I hope that we continue to share #pophealth data in almost real time with the wider community #hcldr
